hero.title: One subscription. Infinite possibilities.
hero.subtitle: The wellness journey that changes the way you experience wellness in Greece.

subscription.title: Credits that work the way you want.
subscription.description1: Every month you get credits that you can use freely. Yoga today, massage tomorrow, fitness on the weekend.
subscription.description2: You can cancel, update or add more credits at any time. Zero commitment issues! ðŸ™Œ

discovery.description2: Book a spot with one tap, see reviews from the community, and get ready for the best wellness experience ever!

experience.title: Scan. Enter. Enjoy. That's it.
experience.description1: When you arrive at the location, simply scan the QR code. No paperwork, no 'I'm on the list' moments.
experience.description2: Contactless check-in that puts you in the vibe immediately. Welcome to the future of wellness in Greece! âœ¨

hero.subtitle: We're two code-loving, wellness-obsessed entrepreneurs (and a very good girl ðŸ•) who decided to make wellness in Greece more accessible, fun, and doable for all of us!

story.title: Our Story (So Far!)
story.paragraph1: We started as two front-end developers trying to find time for yoga, padel or something else between sprints and deadlines. Spoiler alert: it wasn't going well!
story.paragraph2: One Saturday morning, after another failed attempt to book an appointment at 5 different padel courts (because they all had different apps, different payment methods, and generally chaos), we said:
story.quote: What if there was an app that made wellness easy for everyone?
story.paragraph3: Fast forward two years, infinite cups of coffee, and countless late-night coding sessions later... here we are! KymaClub was born from our personal need to make wellness part of our daily routine, not something that requires a PhD to organize.

team.title: The Dream Team
team.description: Two people full of caffeine and big dreams, plus a golden retriever who is the unofficial Director of Happiness. Takes care of the office floors being always covered with golden retriever glitter (google it).

cto.title: The CTO
cto.description: Handles the magic of technology and numbers. Still writes code at 2 AM when inspired.

ceo.title: The CEO
ceo.description: Orchestrates everything! Design, partnerships, and keeps everyone calm. Writes code until 22:00 (sleeps early).

mission.subtitle: We believe that wellness shouldn't be a luxury or rocket science. It should be something that fits your life, not something you need life reorganization for.

accessible.title: Accessible
accessible.description: Your life is unpredictable; your wellness experience doesn't need to be. Credits that work the way you want, when you want.

community.title: Community first
community.description: We don't just build an app - we build a community of people who want to feel good, together and for themselves.

technology.title: Technology for good
technology.description: We use our love for technology to solve real problems. Not disruption for the sake of disruption - meaningful innovation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: In 5 years, we want every person in Greece to be able to say: 'Oh, wellness? Yes, I use KymaClub!' And mean it in the best way!

values.title: What Guides Us Every Day
values.subtitle: These are the values that guide every decision, every feature, and every interaction at KymaClub ðŸ’œ

authenticity.title: Honest Conversation, Real Solutions
authenticity.description: We don't do fake it till you make it. We talk about real difficulties, real successes and real solutions. If something doesn't work, we say it. If something is fantastic, we celebrate it. Simple and clear.
authenticity.quote: Better brutally honest than politely useless.

kindness.title: Gentle Progress > Perfect Performance
kindness.description: We're not here to make you feel guilty if you missed the yoga class. We're here to support you to try again tomorrow. Progress over perfection, always.
kindness.quote: Wellness should feel like a warm hug, not a military boot camp.

innovation.title: Tech That Actually Helps
innovation.description: We don't build features because they're cool or trendy. We build solutions that solve actual problems we've personally experienced. Every line of code has a purpose.
innovation.quote: If it doesn't make wellness easier, we don't build it.

cta.title: Want to Be Part of Our Story?
cta.subtitle: Whether you're a wellness enthusiast looking for the next level experience, or a studio owner who wants to reach more people - come grow with us!
cta.questions: Have questions? Want to say Hi? We're here to meet new people!
cta.contact: Contact us - we read and respond to every message ðŸ’œ

productManager.title: Product Manager
productManager.description: Join the product team and help shape the future of wellness in Greece! We're looking for someone with vision and execution skills.
requirements: Excellent communication skills in Greek and English

growthManager.title: Growth Manager
growthManager.description: Drive KymaClub's growth! We're looking for someone who combines analytical thinking with creativity to scale our platform.
requirements: Experience with user acquisition and retention
Strong analytical skills and data-driven mindset

marketingSpecialist.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
marketingSpecialist.description: Help us tell KymaClub's story! We're looking for someone who knows how to make wellness trendy.

communityManager.title: Community Manager
communityManager.description: Become the face of the KymaClub community! Build relationships, organize events and make users feel part of something special.

softwareEngineerIntern.title: Software Engineer Intern
softwareEngineerIntern.description: Start your tech career with us! Learn from experienced developers while contributing to real features that impact users.
requirements: Currently pursuing Computer Science or related degree
Basic knowledge of JavaScript/TypeScript and React

waveEnergy.title: Wave Energy
waveEnergy.description: We bring fresh energy to everything we do. Innovation, creativity and positive vibes!

authenticConnections.title: Authentic Connections
authenticConnections.description: We believe in the power of authentic connection - with users, partners and among ourselves.

growthMindset.title: Growth Mindset
growthMindset.description: We learn, evolve and grow together. Mistakes are just data for the next level!

wellnessFirst.title: Wellness First
wellnessFirst.description: It's not just our work - it's our way of life. Work-life balance is not optional.
